page.title: 05DEPUTY WARDEN BURWELL HOUSE.
page.content: At 7.00am he get's up,opens up the office and fetches a cup of tea. Then he unlocks all the doors and tidies up.At 8.00am he uses the speaker to tell everybody it's time to get up and he puts the radio on.Breakfast is at 8.30 till about 9.30.After that he has a talk with the teacher of whatever course is going on.At 10.00 it's time for him to open up all the letters,do all the paper_work and answer phone calls.At 10.45 it's time for a coffee and a chat.From 11.30 to 12.00 there's more work.Then from 12.00 till 12.30 he has to open the bar or the tuck shop depending on whether there are adults or children staying.12.30 is lunch time and making sure that the staff are all right and have enough work to carry on with.
